statements: SELECT * FROM game_inventory;
SELECT item_name, quantity, price FROM game_inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT item_description FROM game_inventory WHERE price < 50;
SELECT id, item_type FROM game_inventory ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM game_inventory WHERE item_type = 'weapon' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT id, item_name, item_type, quantity, price FROM game_inventory WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM game_inventory WHERE item_type = 'Weapon' AND price < 50 ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT item_name, item_description, quantity FROM game_inventory WHERE item_type = 'Armor' AND quantity BETWEEN 10 AND 20 ORDER BY item_name, quantity DESC;
SELECT id, item_type, price FROM game_inventory WHERE item_description LIKE '%rare%' ORDER BY id;
SELECT id, item_name, item_type, quantity, price FROM game_inventory WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY item_type, price DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM game_inventory;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM game_inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT item_name FROM game_inventory WHERE quantity >= 10 ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT item_name, attribute_name, attribute_value FROM game_inventory JOIN item_attributes ON game_inventory.id = item_attributes.item_id;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM game_inventory WHERE item_name LIKE 'Sword%';
SELECT * FROM game_inventory ORDER BY id DESC, item_name ASC;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM game_inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT item_name, attribute_name, attribute_value FROM game_inventory JOIN item_attributes ON game_inventory.id = item_attributes.item_id;
SELECT item_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM game_inventory GROUP BY item_name HAVING total_quantity > 0;
SELECT DISTINCT item_name FROM game_inventory WHERE item_name LIKE 'sword%';
SELECT * FROM GameInventory;
SELECT item_name, item_description FROM GameInventory;
SELECT item_name, item_id FROM GameInventory ORDER BY item_name;
SELECT item_name, item_description FROM GameInventory WHERE item_id = 3;

SELECT item_name, attribute_name, quantity FROM GameInventory INNER JOIN ItemStorage ON GameInventory.item_id = ItemStorage.item_id INNER JOIN ItemAttributes ON ItemStorage.attribute_id = ItemAttributes.attribute_id;
SELECT * FROM GameInventory;
SELECT item_id, item_name FROM GameInventory ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT item_id, item_name, item_description FROM GameInventory WHERE item_id < 5;
SELECT * FROM ItemAttributes WHERE attribute_name LIKE '%color%';
SELECT storage_id, item_id, attribute_name, quantity FROM ItemStorage JOIN ItemAttributes ON ItemStorage.attribute_id = ItemAttributes.attribute_id;
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM players WHERE player_level > 10;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM game_inventory WHERE quantity < 50 ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT player_id, item_name, quantity FROM player_inventory JOIN game_inventory ON player_inventory.item_id = game_inventory.item_id;
SELECT player_name, attribute_name, attribute_value FROM players JOIN item_attributes ON players.player_id = item_attributes.item_id ORDER BY player_name DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM game_inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM players WHERE player_level >= 50 ORDER BY player_level DESC;
SELECT item_name, attribute_name, attribute_value FROM game_inventory JOIN item_attributes ON game_inventory.item_id = item_attributes.item_id;
SELECT player_name, item_name, quantity FROM players JOIN player_inventory ON players.player_id = player_inventory.player_id JOIN game_inventory ON player_inventory.item_id = game_inventory.item_id;

SELECT player_name, item_name, quantity FROM players LEFT JOIN player_inventory ON players.player_id = player_inventory.player_id LEFT JOIN game_inventory ON player_inventory.item_id = game_inventory.item_id WHERE quantity IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM Inventory;
SELECT item_id, item_name FROM Inventory WHERE item_id = 1;
SELECT item_name, item_description FROM Inventory ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT player_id, total_points FROM PlayerProfile WHERE total_points > 1000;
SELECT player_name, total_points FROM PlayerProfile WHERE player_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM Inventory;
SELECT item_name, item_description FROM Inventory ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM ItemAttributes WHERE attribute_type = 'weapon';
SELECT player_name, total_points FROM PlayerProfile WHERE total_points > 100 ORDER BY total_points DESC;
SELECT item_id, item_name, quantity FROM PlayerInventory WHERE player_id = 1 ORDER BY item_id;
